snippet: Despite trailing in the fourth quarter for the first time, the Knicks forced seven turnovers in the period, holding Orlando to 13 points as they moved to 5-0 for the season.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Orlando Magic, 99-89, to remain NBA's only unbeaten team.
lead_paragraph: Despite trailing in the fourth quarter for the first time, the Knicks forced seven turnovers in the period, holding Orlando to 13 points as they moved to 5-0 for the season.

headline.seo: Knicks Beat Magic and Climb to 5-0
headline.main: Challenged Late, the Knicks Remain Undefeated
headline.print_headline: Challenged Late, the Knicks Climb to 5-0
